constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 34 (Tuesday, February 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MURPHY of North Carolina:
H.R. 1254.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 (Clause 1, Clause 17, and Clause 18)
of the U.S. Constitution and Article 4, Section 3 (Clause 2)
of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H589]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Eliminate Agency Excess Space Act
